131  const BufferAttributeType& attributeType() const {
132  return m_type;
133  }
134 
135 
137 
138  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
141 
143  bool isNull() const {
144  return m_type == BufferAttributeType::kNone;
145  }
146 
149  template<typename T>
150  void getContents(std::vector<T>& outContents) {
151  // Note: Must bind buffer before calling this or will crash
152  int s = size();
153  if (s < 0) return;
154  size_t count = s / sizeof(T);
155  getContents(0, count, outContents);
156  }
157 
158  template<typename T>
159  void getContents(int offset, int count, std::vector<T>& outContents) {
160  // Must bind buffer or will crash
161  Q_UNUSED(offset)
162  if (m_type != kNone) {
163  bind();
164 
165  outContents.resize(count);
166  unsigned int size = count * sizeof(T);
167  bool readData = read(offset, &outContents[0], size);
168 #ifdef DEBUG_MODE
169  if (!readData) {
170  Logger::Throw("Failed to readData");
171  }
172 #endif
173  }
174  }
175 
177 
178  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
181 
184  virtual const char* className() const { return "BufferObject"; }
185 
189  virtual const char* namespaceName() const { return "rev::GL::BufferObject"; }
191 
192 protected:
193  friend class VertexArrayObject;
194 
195  unsigned int getTupleSize();
196 
198  BufferAttributeType m_type = BufferAttributeType::kNone;
199 };
